players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Alice is dead. This is shocking. We need to figure out who did this. I have no special abilities, so I'll be relying on all of you to share your thoughts and observations."
You: "I'm shocked about Alice too. Since Charlie claims no special abilities, I'm curious if anyone has any leads or suspicions yet."
Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Charlie: "Diana claims Bob is the mafioso and that she investigated him. Bob, what do you say to this accusation?"
You: "Diana is lying. I investigated her last night and she is the mafioso. We should vote her out immediately."
Diana: "I am the detective. I investigated Bob and he is mafioso. Bob is lying about investigating me - only one detective exists."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Alice is dead. This is shocking. We need to figure out who did this. I have no special abilities, so I'll be relying on all of you to share your thoughts and observations."
Bob: "I'm shocked about Alice too. Since Charlie claims no special abilities, I'm curious if anyone has any leads or suspicions yet."

Charlie: "Diana claims Bob is the mafioso and that she investigated him. Bob, what do you say to this accusation?"
